nodes.text: The Imperial-controlled Fuel Station Ergo was an orbiting fuel station.

Kyle Katarn boarded the station and hijacked a smuggler ship that was due to rendezvous with the Executor, which would take him to the Arc Hammer, which housed the final construction facility for the Dark Trooper.

Jason Fry, co-author of The Essential Atlas, indicated during discussions that Ergo was excluded from The Essential Atlas Online Companion because it is not the effective name of a location but a military code used for the designation of the station.
